      Methods in valerioFarriciello.Controller with parameters of type Team 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean League.assignManagerToATeam(Manager manager, Team team)
      Responsible to validate the manager assignment for the team.
      boolean League.assignPlayerToATeam(Player player, Team team)
      This method is responsible to validate the player assignment to a team.
      void League.deleteTeam(Team teamToDelete)
      Get a team object selected from the VIEW components and then passes it to the database object that will be
      in charge of removing all the existing instances in the PlayersAssignment table.
      java.lang.String League.getAllThePlayersToDisplayInATeam(Team team)
      This method is used to get a String that will be used to list all the players from a specific team.
      This method is used in the DisplayTab class in order to display the players into the text area ORDERED BY THEIR NAMES.
